summary: Skyrim, of course, a brilliant game, only original music becomes boring very quickly - it is not enough variety. That is why the idea to create this collection.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim, of course, a brilliant game, only original music becomes boring very quickly - it is not enough variety. That is why the idea to create this collection.
It reworked almost the entire game music: created exclusively for themselves, but I hope someone will like.

There are tracks from:
- Alone in the Dark 
- Resident Evil Afterlife 
- Shadow of The Colossus 
- Death Note 
- Collection of Celtic music

installation:
Throw in a folder DATA, confirm the change (before this, make a backup copy)

Asked the video? keep:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0dnkJwP3Go
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-vwmhKWkqA

http://yadi.sk/d/MImeCIkB4wJAF
author: AYkeNA
